item.title: Automated Question Generation and Answer Verification using Visual Data
item.description: This paper delineates the automation of question generation as an extension to existing Visual Question Answering (VQA) systems. Through our research, we have been able to build a system that can generate questions and answer pairs on images. It consists of two separate modules - Visual Question Generation (VQG) which generates questions based on the image, and a Visual Question Answering (VQA) module that produces a befitting answer that the VQG module generates.
